name: single-page-react
description: A single-page React application showcasing modern web development tools and techniques.
features: Built with React and React Router for frontend rendering and navigation.
Uses Tailwind CSS for a utility-first approach to styling.
Integrates Sass for enhanced CSS functionality.
Utilizes React Icons for easily adding SVG icons to components.
Implements React Hook Form for efficient form handling.
Includes smooth scrolling functionality with React Scroll.
Optimized build and development workflows with Vite and TypeScript.
Configured with ESLint for code linting and TypeScript type checking.
Animation variants with customizable fade-in effects using framer-motion in variants.ts.
